overview: Mario Salieri, one of the greatest porn directors from Italy, brings you the sequel to Stravos. Expect more very well thought out plot and excellent cinematography in this masterpiece of pornography. His films have something that you won't find in most pornographic movies, art. From his choice of camera work to his choice of actors and actresses everything is carefully planned and it shows. Pornography aficionados should waste no time in taking a look at this brilliant work.
title: Stavros 2
